item.title: The Evolving Global Production Structure: Implications for International Political Economy
item.description: Lawton, Thomas C., Kevin P. Michaels. In Strange Power: Shaping the Parameters of International Relations and International Political Economy, edited by Thomas Lawton, James Rosenau, Amy C. Verdun, 79-96. London: Routledge, 2000. Keywords: Political Economy; Production; Theory; International Relations; General Framework Text access (external link)
